title: wine_Hermann_J._Wiemer_2012_HJW_Vineyard_Dry_Estate_Bottled_and_Grown_Riesling_(Seneca_Lake)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 113650.
country: US.
description: Gorgeously aromatic with notes of white blossoms and waxy lime and lemon skins, this dry, delicately composed Riesling is a stunner. Tart mango and and tangerine flavors are juicy on the palate, accented with lemon verbena and a lingering waxiness. It finishes remarkably long with a streak of lemon acidity and a zesty astringency. Delicious now for its youth and exuberance, but likely to develop well over through 2021â€“2024..

price: 39.0.
